channel.title: Restart Server that is portforwarded using uTorrent
channel.description: Hello all. I want to know is there a server restarter that can restart a server that is portforwarded using uTorrent? When I use the Vista restarter, (I am using Vista) it doesn't work because it says the port is being used. Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 06:03:58 pm[/size][hr]Is there any way I can do this? Or can i only manual restart.
